Mad Octopus Diving Club.name: Mad Octopus Diving Club
Mad Octopus Diving Club.description:
Description
What is Mad Octopus Diving Club?
We are Mad Octopus Diving Club 🐙 and we pioneer environmentally sustainable NFTs. 
WHY: Everyday 8 million plastic pieces pollute our oceans.🌊 
WHAT: Therefore we have created MODC to raise awareness for the problem and funds to donate to NGOs removing ocean plastic. 
HOW: 
70% of all proceeds through the NFT sale will be donated, 30% will be used for marketing and development cost. 
We are transparently communicating which NGOs we want to support and the holders of MODC NFTs are to decide what the split of donations to these NGOs will be. There are NGOs that accept donations in crypto, thus the donations will be transparent and visible on the blockchain. 
On top of that the environmental impact of each MODC will be stored on the blockchain as well, calculated through ETH prices at the moment of purchase as well as additional donations to the NFT which will increase the impact, backed by scientific papers on how much it costs to remove 1kg of plastic from the ocean. 
Holders and thus members of the Mad Octopus Diving Club will be eligble to: vote on the distribution of donations, receive giveaways like products made out of ocean plastic, participate in impact challenges to win prizes, and many more described in our roadmap.

Mageo.name: Mageo
Mageo.description:
Description
What is Mageo?
👑 Mageo is a free-to-experience 🕹️ virtual world 🗺️ mapped on top of 🌎 the entire planet. You can own certain 🎟️ tokenized 🎭 characters, 🛠️ objects and even 👤 user profiles, all of which are ❤️ alive and 🏃 active in the world of Mageo - they can 📈 gain or 📉 lose popularity, 🚶 move around the virtual world and 👋 interact with 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 other users.

Magic Box.description:

What is Magic Box?
Fancy tools include: write eth note, cancel blocked tx etc.

Magic Mushrooms.name: Magic Mushrooms
Magic Mushrooms.description:
Description
What is Magic Mushrooms?
A very simple betting game. Win or Lose, The pot is yours for the taking. But you really will never know, unless you play the fool. Go ahead, Its all you now! And if you play it on your mobile.... try tilting your phone. Enjoy!

magic.jpeg.name: magic.jpeg
magic.jpeg.description:
Description
What is magic.jpeg?
Magic.jpeg is a Canvas 128 x 128 Pixels wide where ach of the 16,348 Pixels can be bought and owned as an NFT
Anyone is able to color any unowned Pixel on the Canvas until someone buy it and then only the owner has control over its color
Buying a Pixel also unlocks its Powers. You can choose to blend in with your neighbors, make your color a mystery, and more coming soon!
Every Saturday 8PM PDT we take a digital Snapshot of the Canvas and Pixel owners get selected to receive it as an NFT

MagicSoda.name: MagicSoda
MagicSoda.description:
Description
What is MagicSoda?
亞洲 Magic Soda 區塊鏈團隊建置的”去中心化APP"，不用透過特定的網頁插件即可遊玩，只要你有乙太幣錢包即可。兩款遊戲完全以智能合約運行已達到信任與公平性，不會被造假的可能，可直接打款到合約地址開始遊玩此遊戲。

MagicX.name: MagicX
MagicX.description:
Description
What is MagicX?
New financial era. Gain from 2% to 5% per day! Your percent grows each week of HOLDING!

MAIN.name: MAIN
MAIN.description:
Description
What is MAIN?
MAIN is a crypto social network owned and operated by its users.
Each community on the platform has its own coins that anybody can buy and sell. The price of coins goes up when people buy them and goes down when people sell.
On MAIN you can:
Do everything the same as in other social networks: make posts, comment, rate others users, create your own communities or join existing ones.
Get MAIN tokens for your activity on the platform or as rewards from other users. Tokens are distributed every day to all MAIN users.
Own communities right on the blockchain. You can buy and sell community coins, participate in voting and make money on community growth.
Withdraw tokens from the platform and exchange them for other cryptocurrencies.

NEWMake a Whale.name: NEWMake a Whale
NEWMake a Whale.description:
Description
What is Make a Whale?
Make a Whale is a random, peer-to-peer redistribution of wealth. People pay an entry fee, and that fee is collected into a pot. At the end of the block time, a random entrant is selected and distributed their winnings. A percentage of the pot goes back to the contract.

Manekio.name: Manekio
Manekio.description:
Description
What is Manekio?
Manek.io is a parimutuel social betting game. Bet on movie ratings, real life events, and more. Odds dynamically change as players bet. Shill other players to bet against you for higher payouts. Put your money where your mouth is and get paid for your opinion. Each bet has a jackpot which any better could win.

Mango.name: Mango
Mango.description:
Description
What is Mango ?
Mango is a team which is full of strong experience in blockchain game development. We come from different countries and different skin colors. We are committed to bringing players better, faster and fairer experience in gambling DAPP . We will also continue to launch different kinds of games in different public chains. Mango是一支技术经验雄厚的区块链游戏开发团队。 团队成员来自不同的国家，不同的肤色。 我们致力于给玩家带来更好，更快，更公平的游戏DAPP体验。 我们将不断的在不同的公链推出不同种类的游戏.

Mantle Finance.name: Mantle Finance
Mantle Finance.description:
Description
What is Mantle Finance?
Mantle Finance is a decentralized lending platform offers an alternative for token holders and NFT collectors to get liquidity from the global crypto space.
We believe the total value of NFTs will grow substantially. At that moment, NFT holders will not have their NFTs lying uselessly in their wallets. Therefore, Mantle is focused on improving the liquidity of NFT. We are developing more features to increase the usability and capital efficiency of NFT so users can use them for other financial purposes.
In the near future, more developers will participate in the construction of NFTs, not only for application scenarios such as lending, borrowing and fractionalizing, but also for the exploring the inherent values. As long as the NFT participation threshold is wide enough, more people will naturally flood into NFT ecosystem.

Marble.Cards.name: Marble.Cards
Marble.Cards.description:
Description
What is Marble.Cards?
MarbleCards is a collectible card game based on web URLs. Any link you visit can be turned into a Marble card, but only once.

MARKET Protocol.name: MARKET Protocol
MARKET Protocol.description:
Description
What is MARKET Protocol?
MARKET Protocol allows users to trade the price of anything while leveraging the benefits of the blockchain. Trade stocks, cryptocurrencies, and traditional assets. MPX is the first exchange built to trade Market Protocol Position Tokens.

Marquise $Museum.name: Marquise $Museum
Marquise $Museum.description:
Description
What is Marquise $Museum?
Marquise $Museum was created in 2016 as an art business and integrated with blockchain November 2017
It is SCC Certified 4th oldest ERC-20 NFT / 1st NFTx deployed a few months after Autoglyphs, Cryptopunks, Mooncats
There are 3 decentralized NFTx swap Funds on Uniswap and Waves for tokenizing catalogued NFTs at 10% -  30% LTV:
  NFTx-M1 / Waves Dex
NFTx-M2 / Waves Dex
NFTx-M3 / Uniswap
The complete collection of 83 images is scheduled for Opensea and website publication together with 1 Audiobook NFT and Viking $M1 Cryptobook. 17 are published and trading.
Mint limit:
20x83 image NFTs
1 Audiobook license
30 Viking $M1 Cryptobooks
Floor price index is trailing Autoglyphs and Cryptopunks.

Marriage Unblocked.name: Marriage Unblocked
Marriage Unblocked.description:
Description
What is Marriage Unblocked?
Marriage unblocked makes it possible for everyone to go down the aisle on blockchain, store your encrypted vows forever and get a certificate of your digital marriage. Anonymously or proudly public. No state, religion or family approval needed. Initiative by Björn Borg, coded by Superblocks.com

MarriageOnTheBlock.name: MarriageOnTheBlock
MarriageOnTheBlock.description:
Description
What is MarriageOnTheBlock?
MarriageOnTheBlock allows people to register decentralized marriage certificates and manage their marital budgets and marital status.

Mars Genesis.name: Mars Genesis
Mars Genesis.description:
Description
What is Mars Genesis?
The Mars Genesis cards are "Non-Fungible Tokens" on Ethereum and ERC-721 standard that powers most digital art and collectibles.
No parcel has the same size or collection of attributes. Therefore, each has a different value. As a matter of fact, the topography, water data, temperature range, and colony conditions are accurate to the extent of human knowledge and from compiling state-of-the-art research.
Mars is finite. Therefore, once the 10,000 cards covering the planet are minted, the only way to acquire one is to purchase it from someone via the marketplace that is embedded in the blockchain. Via this market, you can buy, bid on, and offer cards for sale.
Each card represents a parcel of land on Mars with unique coordinates. These coordinates are part of the contract and define the unicity of a card. Therefore, and unlike any other NFT project, if for some obscure reasons, the IPFS (InterPlanetary File System) would go down, what makes your card unique and distinguishable would still live on the blockchain forever.
Each new card minted is generated randomly from the pool of remaining parcels. Prices start at 0.15 ETH and increase progressively to 0.5 ETH for the most expensive cards. For every trade on MarsGenesis marketplace, the first-owner of a card (minter) will receive a 4% royalty in perpetuity.

Mars26.name: Mars26
Mars26.description:
Description
What is Mars26?
Mars NFTs are your personal, unique pieces of scarce space art with traits and showcasing utility. Each of the 16200 NFTs consists of high-resolution, colorized imagery created from low-resolution/grey Mars photographs and represents a unique 2-by-2 degree surface area of the red planet. Each token comes with a unique set of traits describing natural features like craters, sc-ifi features like popular places from literature and over 60 more feature categories unique to the respective area. Owning a Mars NFT enables you to showcase objects on the open source Mars map app.

MARS4.name: MARS4
MARS4.description:
Description
What is MARS4?
Mars4.me is Metaverse with created Virtual Mars. It has deflationary MARS$ & 1st in the World Revenue Generating NFTs, which leverages property rights and incentivises holding & spending tokens on in-world assets and resources.

Mask Network.name: Mask Network
Mask Network.description:
Description
What is Mask Network?
Mask Network is positioned to become the bridge that connects internet users from Web 2.0 to Web 3.0. The foundational technology of Mask Network is a peer-to-peer encrypted messaging application, with new functions continuously being created around this foundation. We at Mask Network are strong believers in the ownership economy. People should own what they produce, people should own their data, their attention and the virtual space they choose to contribute to.
Mask Network integrates decentralized social messaging, borderless payment network, decentralized file storage and sharing, decentralized finance, DAO and NFT to provide a safe and convenient portal for users to jump right into the continent of decentralized finance and then the new world of Web 3.0.

MaskForMusk.name: MaskForMusk
MaskForMusk.description:
Description
What is MaskForMusk?
Created by the TheCosmoMasks team, promo collection.

MasterFuruNft.name: MasterFuruNft
MasterFuruNft.description:
Description
What is MasterFuruNft?
The Master FURU represents a colliding of the finance and NFT world. It will highlight the best FURUs on the web, and aim to bridge the gap between traditional trading communities and the new Web 3.0.

Mavro.name: Mavro
Mavro.description:
Description
What is Mavro?
New, perfect, decentralized system on Ethereum - MAVRO! The world is changing, the economy is developing, the crypto-currencies are being introduced into our lives. The evolution of MMM begins. This is what you have been waiting for. Revolution in the world of mlm, pyramids and hype. Now everything is honest and legal, without theft and forgery.

Maxwells.name: Maxwells
Maxwells.description:
Description
What is Maxwells?
James Clerk Maxwell is one of the most underrepresented and yet influential human beings to have ever lived. When Einstein was asked whether he stood on the shoulders of Sir Isaac Newton he replied, “I stand on the shoulders of James Clerk Maxwell”. Einstein kept a picture of Maxwell above the fireplace in his study, alongside Newton and Faraday.
This collection is an ode to one of the greatest scientists in history and takes key components from many areas of his various works. Algorithms were used to calculate vector fields and created oscillations, curve and the electromagnetic movements you see in each Maxwell.
